articles.title: Coronavirus booster shots 'not a luxury', WHO Europe head says - The Star Online
articles.description: COPENHAGEN (Reuters) -A third-dose booster shot of the COVID-19 vaccination is a way to keep the most vulnerable safe and "not a luxury", the World Health Organization said on Monday.
articles.content:
COPENHAGEN (Reuters) -A third-dose booster shot of the COVID-19 vaccination is a way to keep the most vulnerable safe and "not a luxury", the World Health Organization said on Monday.

articles.title: EU to recommend reinstating restrictions on US travelers - Associated Press
articles.description: BRUSSELS (AP) — The European Union plans to recommend that its 27 nations reinstate restrictions on tourists from the U.S. because of rising coronavirus infection levels there, EU diplomats said Monday.
